name: FUUU...!
description:
It's color blindness test fun journey!

Follow the path to find your way out, collect the coins through various terrains!
One wrong step and you are dead.
Jump over the mines and be aware of your surroundings, or you can get easily lost!

-The level colors are picked carefully based on the notorious ishihara plate tests.
-Now featuring "Color Blind Helper Mode" - you can reach it from the pause menu,
if you can' t see anymore where to go!

Have fun!
